semantic_description: RabbitMQ publish/consume operations inside the CLM-Web service that currently do not appear in Jaeger or lack key span attributes.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the variable 'queueName' used when publishing or consuming

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.rabbitmq.routing_key
attributes_to_add.value_source: the variable 'routingKey' passed to BasicPublish / BasicConsume

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.message_id
attributes_to_add.value_source: basicProperties.MessageId (if available) or an equivalent message identifier

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the literal string 'publish' or 'receive', depending on the code path
